author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CATEGORY 4 ERIN CONTINUES TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY... ...OUTER RAINBANDS BEGINNING TO AFFECT THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS...
summary: ...CATEGORY 4 ERIN CONTINUES TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY... ...OUTER RAINBANDS BEGINNING TO AFFECT THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... As of 8:00 AM AST Sat Aug 16 the center of Erin was located near 19.6, -62.0 with movement WNW at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 935 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 145 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
